name: SPAAACE WORMS!
description:
Deep in the coldest crevices of a distant asteroid belt...

SPAAACE WORMS!!

Eat food and each other to survive! Escape gravity storms and asteroids! Pickup powerups like lasers, bombs , magnets and nukes, just like real space worms do! Test your worm skills against your friends or your bot friends!

This was an early experiment with new tools while we were porting the Rain World code into C#/Unity, but I still think its fun! Why not let you have it?
